sentences.english: Twilight was closing on the diminished autumn day.
sentences.chinese: 秋日苦短，暮靄正在攏來。

sentences.english: Darkness was blacking out both sea and jungle .
sentences.chinese: 暮靄漸漸掩蔽了海洋和叢林。

sentences.english: The dog came bounding back and barked till the evening hills echoed the sound.
sentences.chinese: 狗跳跳蹦蹦地跑回來直到暮靄籠罩的羣山發出了回聲。

sentences.english: Through this low-lit mistiness Tess walked leisurely along.
sentences.chinese: 苔絲就在這樣光線暗淡的暮靄裏，往前從從容容地走。

sentences.english: In me thou seest the twilight of such day.
sentences.chinese: 在我身上你或許會看見暮靄。

sentences.english: The joyous sound wave drifted through the golden evening mist.
sentences.chinese: 歡愉的音波，在金色的暮靄中游泳。

sentences.english: And the Earth was all rest , and the air was all love.
sentences.chinese: 大地也休息了，暮靄中就瀰漫了愛情。

definition: to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
Milky Way/also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
